landing.message_password_recovery: If the user is correct, an email will be sent to recover your password
landing.blocked_login: The APP has crashed due to the number of attempts being exceeded, try after 2 minutes.
landing.message_failure_response: An unexpected error has occurred Try again
landing.message_error_internet_disconnected: There is no Internet connection. Connect to the Internet and try again.

legal.acept_conditions_label: I have read and accept the conditions
legal.no_get_conditions_label: There are no legal terms assigned to this user
legal.messaje_reject_terms: This app for proper use requires that the legal conditions have been accepted, in which case you will not be able to continue browsing. Do you want to refuse the legal conditions?

sms.title: We start with your email
sms.text1: You will receive an email with a verification code. Because your privacy is the most important thing!
sms.text2: Your email will only be used for urgent or emergency situations, but will never be shared with other companies or third parties.
sms.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address

verification.title: Confirm your verification code
verification.text1: We have sent you an email with a code to verify your user account and be able to continue. If you have not received any email press
verification.send_email_alert_message: The verification code has been sent again
verification.error_send_email_alert_message: An error occurred while sending the verification code

intro.slider1_text2: All your medical information in one app
intro.slider1_text4: Talk to your specialist directly or request a face-to-face consultation
intro.slider1_text6: Connect your health apps to see your progress
intro.slider2_text1: The Doole Health agenda allows you to include all your appointments and medical reminders. You won't be able to live without it!
intro.slider3_text1: Talk to your doctor and specialist via video call or chat and request an appointment in person It's never been so fast and comfortable!
intro.slider4_text1: Review clinical results, answer forms or check the evolution of your constants. Now you can review them whenever you want!
intro.slider5_text1: At a glance review your diet, medication, games and health information for the day. Taking care of your health has never been easier!
intro.slider6_text1: Have the latest health news and advice from the medical team Stay updated at all times!
intro.slider7_text1: Set your data and notification preferences so you can always be informed. Enjoy your experience at Doole Health!

conversation.warning_text: This is not a real-time chat

contact.text_video: Talk directly to your regular professional or a specialist from wherever you want. You will be attended at the selected time
contact.text_regular_professional: Book an appointment with your doctor or usual professional to make the video consultation
contact.text_other_specialists: Book an appointment with a specialist to make the video consultation
contact.text_appointment_in_person: Book a face-to-face appointment with your regular professional or a specialist when you need it. You will be attended at the selected time
contact.text_appointment_regular_professional: Book your face-to-face appointment with the usual doctor
contact.text_appointment_other_specialists: Book your face-to-face appointment with another specialist
contact.text_chat: Now you can talk via chat with your regular doctor or a specialist. They will attend you as soon as possible.
contact.text_recent_conversations: Access your latest conversations with your regular professionals
contact.text_new_conversation: Open a new conversation with your regular professionals

medical_calendar.no_slot_available: There are no slots available for this day

specialist_finder.text_attachments: You can attach files or images that help us make a better diagnosis

bookings.text_attachments: You can attach files or images that help us make a better diagnosis

info.title: Information
info.news: In this section you can find the news and advice that best suits your profile
info.family: In this section you can log in with the user of whom you are a guardian or caregiver, being able to access their health data. We will warn you on each page that you are acting on behalf of another with an exclamation point (!). You can return to your profile whenever you want by clicking on this same sign
info.medication: You can change the status of the medication (take, taken or forgotten) by clicking on this button
info.chat: Remember that it may take a while for your doctor to answer you, depending on their workload. Thank you for being patient!

face-id.description: This app crashes to ensure your safety
face-id.title: Security check
face-id.subtitle: Fingerprint access

biometrics.text1: Biometric access allows you to access the app using your fingerprint, facial recognition or any system you have defined on this device to identify yourself safely.
biometrics.text2: Do you want to activate biometric access now?
biometrics.text3: You can activate and deactivate it later from the configuration section of the app.
biometrics.text4: Biometric access has been successfully activated.
biometrics.text5: You can use it to access the app the next time you run it.
biometrics.disabled: The device's biometrics could not be accessed.

security.rooted: This device has been detected to have been initialized with unusual user rights (root). For reasons of security and data integrity, access has been blocked.
